    • Method Detail

      • registerGlobalServiceWReg

        public static org.osgi.framework.ServiceRegistration registerGlobalServiceWReg(Class<?> clazz,
                                                               Object instance,
                                                               Dictionary<String,Object> properties)
        Register a Global Service in the OSGi service registry
        Parameters:
        clazz - The target class
        instance - of the object exporting the service, be careful the object must implement/extend clazz else the registration will fail unless a ServiceFactory is passed as parameter
        properties - The properties to be attached to the service registration
        Returns:
        the ServiceRegistration if registration happened, null otherwise

      • getGlobalInstance

        public static Object getGlobalInstance(Class<?> clazz,
                       Object bundle)
        Retrieve global instance of a class via OSGI registry, if there are many only the first is returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The target class
        bundle - The caller

      • getGlobalInstance

        public static Object getGlobalInstance(Class<?> clazz,
                       Object bundle,
                       String serviceFilter)
        Retrieve global instance of a class via OSGI registry, if there are many only the first is returned. On this version an LDAP type of filter is applied
        Parameters:
        clazz - The target class
        bundle - The caller
        serviceFilter - LDAP filter to be applied in the search

      • getGlobalInstances

        public static Object[] getGlobalInstances(Class<?> clazz,
                          Object bundle,
                          String serviceFilter)
        Retrieve all the Instances of a Service, optionally filtered via serviceFilter if non-null else all the results are returned if null
        Parameters:
        clazz - The target class
        bundle - The caller
        serviceFilter - LDAP filter to be applied in the search
